p: The study was a one-stage randomized phase II trial with the primary objective of comparing the incidence of aGvHD in two bort-based GvHD prophylaxis regimens to conventional tac/mtx. The study was designed for the primary comparisons of the grade II-IV aGvHD rates in Arm A vs. B and Arm A vs. C in parallel, and was powered to test the hypothesis of superiority in Arm B and C (15%), compared to that in Arm A (40%). The accrual goal was 138 patients, randomizing all eligible patients in 1:1:1 ratio to the three regimens. Randomization was stratified by degree of HLA-match (8/8 vs. 7/8).
